Race.SpecificTitle: Ward 3 Fire Prot. Dist. -- 10 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Ward Three Fire Protection District Proposition
(Millage Renewal)

Summary:  Renewal of a 10 year 10 mills property tax for building, maintaining, operating and equipping the fire department and related buildings in said Fire District for fire protection.
Race.FullText: Shall Ward Three Fire Protection District, Parish of Jackson, State of Louisiana  (the "District"), levy a special tax of ten (10) mills on all the property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $68,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purposes of building, maintaining, operating and equipping the Volunteer Fire Department and related buildings in said Fire Protection District, for fire protection, title to which shall be in the public?
